name: Assassin's Creed Unity - Secrets of the Revolution
name_original: Assassin's Creed Unity - Secrets of the Revolution
description:
The Revolution is not over, the people of Paris still need your help.<br/>
<br/>
Discover the last secrets of the French Revolution with this pack including:<br/>
- 3 missions: “The Chemical Revolution”, “The American Prisoner”, and “Killed by Science”<br/>
- 8 weapons ranging from powerful rifles and pistols, to razor-sharp axes and swords<br/>
- 6 pieces of gear to equip Arno with the finest and most resistant armor
